title: Boku no Hero Academia Original Eiga Manner Kouza

synonyms: Boku no Hero Academia Reigi Kouza
alternative_titles.ja: 「僕のヒーローアカデミア」オリジナル映画マナー講座

synopsis:
It features comical interactions that make use of the usual characters, such as Bakugou getting angry over a phone call during the screening between the current No.1 hero Endeavor and his son Shouto, and Deku getting flustered when Bakugou starts eating snacks!

(Source: Toho Official Website)
